text: Wíres José de Souza or simply Wíres (born December 30, 1982) is a Brazilian defensive midfielder currently playing for Rio Ave. ==References== ==External links== * ESPN FC: Wires José de Souza Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:C.R.D.
